column4: sir i have ymessenger1.0.4. can i install it other than GAIM?
it is suggested that you should not, it is suggested that it is broken
tjhat is not how you deal with a distro, what you do is 'sudo apt-get install gaim' and it gives you the version for your system
you install av software if you are providing mail services for windows clients, but Linux to Linux not needed
